name: Sankha Suvra Welfare Society
briefDescription: Broad objectives of the organization are to establish the right of education, entertainment and health of the poor and underprivileged children of the society. They try to facilitate the poor and dis-advantaged section of population towards prosperity in the aspects of socio-political, economical, and on cultural and health aspects by taking up various development projects commensurate with the local situational context and environmental adaptability.i.	Running a School for the children of the slum areas especially of the working mothers (Maid Servant).a.	Accreditation under NIOSii.	Organizing annual cultural programs on a regular basis which includes Rabindra Jayanti celebration every year, programs for fund raising (Uttarpara Shishume
